about_the_game:
Shadow of Pharos is a short first-person horror game.

The game aims to be a fully immersive experience and has no UI by default. To enable accessibility options and general settings, input the following command using the keyboard arrow keys or the controller D-Pad:
left, right, left, right, down, down

The menu will then be accessible by pressing ESC on the keyboard or Back/Share on a controller.

Default Controls:

  • Movement: WASD on keyboard | Left Analog on controller
  • Look Around: Mouse | Right Analog on controller
  • Interact: E on keyboard | Cross/A on controller
  • Flashlight: F on keyboard | Square/X on controller
  • Notes: Tab on keyboard | Options/Start on controller

Disclaimer: The game's soundtrack was made specifically for the game, and is safe to play on videos/stream. It's also available for free on TeamGaivot's YouTube channel. If you enjoyed the game, consider supporting the team by purchasing the soundtrack here on Steam and wishlisting our next game Pharos.
